parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>


____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Forces drawing of cinema borders when using custom camera [[camCreate]]. This is normally used in cutscenes to indicate player has no control. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''showCinemaBorder''' show </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  show: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[showCinemaBorder]] [[false]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[showHUD]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 13 October 2007 - 15:20 (CEST)
<dt class="note">[[User:Crowe|Crowe]]
<dd class="note">This command does only work when Mission is started. Use [[waitUntil]] {[[time]] > 0}; to be sure it works.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
